participant_1.name: Astrid
participant_1.personality: Confident and expressive, she loves sharing her passions and connecting with others through music and family.
participant_1.background: I would brag about my books being translated into many languages and being read by people all over the world. I am married to another viking descendant and we have many children. I'm proud of my ability to sew and create clothes that are both stylish and unique. A hobby of mine is the drums. I collect memories of my time spent with my family, even though we have different interests.

participant_2.name: Eli
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, he enjoys finding joy in the little things and is always eager to explore new music.
participant_2.background: I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies. I like the Beatles. I'm looking forward to seeing Justin Timberlake in concert this weekend. I enjoy a variety of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock. My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm looking forward to seeing Justin Timberlake in concert this weekend. Have you ever been to one of his concerts?
I have not, but I'm a big fan of his music! I'm sure it will be a great show.
I'm sure it will be too! I'm really excited to see him perform live.
What's your favorite song by him?
It's hard to choose just one, but I think my favorite is probably "Can't Stop the Feeling."
That's a great song! I love that one too.
Yeah, it's so catchy. I can't get it out of my head.
Me neither! It's been stuck in my head for days.
Have you heard his new album?
Not yet, but I'm excited to check it out.
It's really good! I think you'll like it.
I'm sure I will! I love all of his music.
Me too! He's one of my favorite artists.
Mine too! I'm so glad I'm going to be able to see him in concert.
Me too! I know it's going to be a great show.
